title: USL Mode: Ultra Sore Loser Mode
body:
I go into Urf. I see the entire enemy team is AP. I build Banner, an item intentionally made to counter AP champs. And all I get is people complaining.
> Wow stop playing Anti-Fun meta
> I didn't come here to try hard

URF mode brings out the best and worst in people. It's the most fun and crazy mode matched only by the fact everyone is an absolute sook about playing it and losing, and about what is and isn't fair to them.
